title: Vegan pumpkin brownie
ingredients: ['For the pumpkin swirl', '180g pumpkin puree', '20g coconut oil', '3 tablespoons orange juice', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', 'For the brownie', '3 tablespoons flaxseed meal', '5 tablespoons hot water', '100g almond flour', '70g coconut oil', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract (or seeds from 1 vanilla pod)', '70g caster sugar', '3 tablespoons orange juice', '100g dark chocolate, melted', '50g chopped pecans', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper (optional)']
